an5.236:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.236:1.5: ananuvicca apariyogahetva appasadaniye thane pasadam upadamseti;
an5.236:1.6: ananuvicca apariyogahetva pasadaniye thane appasadam upadamseti;
an5.236:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.236:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an5.236:2.5: anuvicca pariyogahetva appasadaniye thane appasadam upadamseti;
an5.236:2.6: anuvicca pariyogahetva pasadaniye thane pasadam upadamseti;
an5.236:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
